ConfigEntry.ConfigEntryObject: <Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>CompliancePolicyViolationsByDepartment</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} policy violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, policy violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Policy Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Employees")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>CompliancePolicyViolationsByLocality</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} policy violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, policy violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased")) </TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Policy Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Employees")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>CompliancePolicyViolationsByProfitCenter</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} policy violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><DashboardDefMonthly>CompliancePolicyViolationsByProfitCenterMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>CompliancePolicyViolationsByProfitCenterYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, policy violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased")) </TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Policy Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Employees")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>CompliancePolicyViolationsByRole</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} policy violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, policy violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))
</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Policy Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Employees")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

ConfigEntry.Value:
sqland(sqlcompareuid("uid_person", variable("%useruid%")),
format("uid_person in (select uid_person from personinaerole where uid_aerole in ('CAP-AEROLE-IAG-CISO', 'CAP-AEROLE-AUDITING-AUDITOR') union all select piae.UID_Person from PersonInAERole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_ParentAERole = piae.UID_AERole where piae.xorigin > 0 and piae.UID_AERole in ( select cr.uid_aeroleruler from qerpolicy cr where ({0})) or piae.UID_AERole in ( select cr.uid_aeroleresponsible from qerpolicy cr where ({0})) or piae.UID_AERole in ( select ca.uid_orgresponsible from compliancearea ca ))" , sqlor(sqlcompare("cr.isinactive",false,"bool","equal"),sqlcompare("cr.isworkingcopy",false,"bool","equal"))))

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#List of policies charts and heatmaps on the governance start page")
translate("#LDS#Visibility of Access Governance - Policies overview")

Container.Condition: ispreprop("QERPolicy") and ((IsNullOrEmpty(Part()) or Part()="Policies") and exists("Person", getconfig("VI_Start_Governance_Policies_Condition")))
